text: Ezer Weizman (, 15 June 1924 – 24 April 2005) was the seventh President of Israel.Ezer Weizman: 1924–2005 San Francisco Chronicle, 25 April 2005 He was first elected in 1993 and re-elected in 1998. Before the presidency, Weizman was commander of the Israeli Air Force and Minister of Defense. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1924 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Government ministers of Israel Category:HaAvoda politicians Category:Israeli generals Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Jewish military people Category:Politicians from Tel Aviv Category:Presidents of Israel
title: Ezer Weizman
